duties_responsibilities.duty: Stock and maintain shelves with leading brands like Oreo, Ritz, belVita, Chips Ahoy, Triscuit, among others.
Follow sales representative's plans within stores and communicate any issues with management team.
Work closely with sales representative to optimize visibility of Mondelez products on shelves and construct promotional displays.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Maintain a professional, positive, and upbeat attitude while representing Mondelēz in store.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver's license and proof of auto insurance
